entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3 except 7 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3 except 7 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
